entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low.
